Title: First pictures: Indian scientists reveal microscopy image of COVID-19 - India TV News

Title: Raincoats and rubber boots for Pakistani aid workers in coronavirus fight - India Today
Description: The Pakistani charity Edhi Foundation has had to train dozens of staff on how to handle suspected coronavirus patients. But providing them with proper protection is a problem, given a nationwide shortage of the equipment.

Title: Coronavirus: Government launches location-based COVID-19 tracking app Corona Kavach - YourStory
Description: MeitY has built a coronavirus tracker for India and the government plans to make the software available to other SAARC nations too.

Title: Coronavirus impact: How did Modi govt arrive at 21-day lockdown period and not 14 - International Business Times, India Edition
Description: There is scientific evidence and epidemiological significance to reason out why the Modi government imposed a national lockdown period of 21-days and not lesser than 21.

Title: Pregnant and worried about coronavirus? Here’s what you need to know - The Indian Express

Title: Coronavirus: Who should wear face mask; do they stop Covid-19 spread | Explainer - India Today
Description: Close-fitting masks, such as N95 ones, can offer good, but not total protection against infectious droplets, while the next rank up, the N99-rated masks can give better protection, but some find them difficult to breathe through.

Title: Coronavirus pandemic: Foreigner treated with HIV drugs for Covid-19 tests negative - India Today
Description: A British national, who had earlier tested positive for Covid-19, responded well to the drugs combination of Ritonavir and Lopinavir (HIV antiretroviral drugs), and his latest test results showed he has tested negative for the virus, a hospital statement said.
